item.title: ğŸ•¹ï¸ KoL | Assorted
item.description: KoLmafia: cross-platform desktop tool to interface with the game in the links below ğŸ”— KoLmafia Installation for Linux Aftercore July 30, 2019 “The Sea is a tough thing for someone with only a couple of skills. Better to wait a bit on that. I’d suggest: go to the Mall and buy a Training Scroll: Snokebomb and read it. You’ll have to use your karma from this run to perm it for use in future runs, but it is an excellent skill to have for turncutting.
